summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Smart Cooking PWA landing page with new colorful design and recipe gallery functionality. All 9 predefined recipes display correctly with working category filters, clickable modals, and full mobile responsiveness.
passed_tests: Landing page loads with colorful gradient design (orange/amber theme)
Recipe gallery displays all 9 recipes with high-quality images from Unsplash/Pexels
Category filters work correctly: All (9 recipes), Salato (4 recipes), Dolce (2 recipes), Veloce (3 recipes)
Recipe cards are clickable and open detailed modal dialogs
Modal displays recipe image, title, prep/cook time, servings, description
Modal shows complete ingredients list with proper formatting
Modal displays step-by-step instructions (Procedimento) with numbered steps
Mobile responsive design works perfectly (390x844 viewport tested)
Category filters remain accessible and functional on mobile
Recipe modals display properly on mobile devices
All CTA buttons present: header login/generate, hero start, footer start/pricing buttons
Footer displays proper branding and links
Smooth animations and hover effects on recipe cards
Category badges display correctly with appropriate colors and emojis

success_percentage.frontend: 100% - All landing page features working perfectly
success_percentage.mobile_responsiveness: 100% - Fully responsive across all tested viewports
